TopicTitle: How to move images in video with FREEWARE software?

Articles.Content: This is the only forum I can trust,so all you video editors out there,please help me!
what you are looking for is a gif. I do not think there is any other formats for moving images beside stop motion.

I mean KEYFRAMING like in IMovie but I use windows.

And btw thanks for replying so quickly!

I mean KEYFRAMING like in IMovie but I use windows.

And btw thanks for replying so quickly!

Unfortunately, there aren't many such free programs around, I haven't heard of any. Your best bet would be Flash or After Effects. I think Sony Vegas can do keyframing too.

There's a few for Linux I think such as Pitivi.

Not used it yet so I don't know if it can do what you need though.
